myapp.data

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • myapp.data.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    User is a representation of the people either maintaining the system, renting the bikes or repairing them.

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(int UserClass,
            java.lang.String firstname,
            java.lang.String lastname,
            int phone,
            java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String landcode)
        When creating a new user in the code, this is the constructor to be used. It creates a temporary password for the user, and holds all information needed to be registered in the database.
        Parameters:
        UserClass - not in use at the moment, but can be used for adding users with different level of access
        firstname - the firstname of the user
        lastname - the lastname of the user
        phone - the phonenumber of the user
        email - the email and username of the person. Passwords and information is sent to this. Used to login user
        landcode - the landcode, to support phones from other countries.

      • User

        public User(int UserID,
            int UserClass,
            java.lang.String firstname,
            java.lang.String lastname,
            int phone,
            java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String landcode)
        This constructor is used by the Database, returning a fulfilled user with all information needed.
        Parameters:
        UserID - the users ID
        UserClass - the level of access the user is given
        firstname - the firstname of the user
        lastname - the lastname of the usr
        phone - the phonenumber of the user
        email - the email and username of the person. Passwords and information is sent to this. Used to login user
        landcode - the landcode, to support phones from other countries.
